Create policy

Create an authorisation policy with a list of authorisation rules.

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/authorisation_policies

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
Example
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "name": "elia_vandervort",
      • "description": "Voluptatem nobis aut nam.",
      • "authorisation_rules": [
        • {
          • "path": "/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa",
          • "readable": false,
          • "updatable": false,
          • "executable": false
          },
        • {
          • "path": "/projects/opc/environments/dev",
          • "readable": false,
          • "updatable": false,
          • "executable": false
          }
        ]
      }
    }
}

  • 201
  • 400
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "4c7d0fd6-3573-4f1e-aad3-09b4069b1cbe",

      • "name": "bari",
      • "description": "Minus quis eum nesciunt.",
      • "system": false,

    • "relationships": {
      • "policy_rules": {
        • "data": [ ]

        • "data": [ ]

      • "authorisation_rules": {
        • "data": [ ]
        }
      },
    • "links": {
      • "self": "/api/authorisation_policies/4c7d0fd6-3573-4f1e-aad3-09b4069b1cbe",
      • "policy_rules": "/api/authorisation_policies/4c7d0fd6-3573-4f1e-aad3-09b4069b1cbe/rules",
      • "policy_assignments": "/api/authorisation_policies/4c7d0fd6-3573-4f1e-aad3-09b4069b1cbe/assignments"

Update authorisation policy and its rules

Update an authorisation policy and its authorisation rules. If no authorisation rules are provided, all associated rules will be removed from the policy.

path Parameters
authorisation_policy_id
required
string
Example: 0669bc0b-b5a7-4b67-b85f-0b684efa55d7

authorisation policy id

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/authorisation_policies/{authorisation_policy_id}

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
Example
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "name": "raymond",
      • "description": "Qui id assumenda dolorem.",
      • "authorisation_rules": [
        • {
          • "path": "/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa",
          • "readable": false,
          • "updatable": false,
          • "executable": false
          },
        • {
          • "path": "/projects/opc/environments/dev",
          • "readable": false,
          • "updatable": false,
          • "executable": false
          }
        ]
      }
    }
}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 400
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "df86e5ed-eb77-44a7-986c-5e16f79ea986",
    • "type": "authorisation_policy",
    • "attributes": {
      • "name": "Updated policy name",
      • "description": "Access for all incoming users",
      • "system": false,
      • "created_by": "rey_kertzmann",
      • "created_at": "2025-10-17T04:04:18.461828Z",
      • "updated_at": "2025-10-17T04:04:18.520660Z"
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "policy_rules": {
        • "data": [ ]
        },
      • "policy_assignments": {
        • "data": [
          • {
            • "id": "bb272209-8554-443c-ab4f-5053f3eefd8c",
            • "type": "policy_assignment"
            }
          ]
        },
      • "authorisation_rules": {
        • "data": [ ]
        }
      },
    • "links": {
      • "self": "/api/authorisation_policies/df86e5ed-eb77-44a7-986c-5e16f79ea986",
      • "policy_rules": "/api/authorisation_policies/df86e5ed-eb77-44a7-986c-5e16f79ea986/rules",
      • "policy_assignments": "/api/authorisation_policies/df86e5ed-eb77-44a7-986c-5e16f79ea986/assignments"
      }
    }
}

Authorisation policy assignments

Endpoints to interact with authorisation policy assignments.

List policy assignments

Lists all policy assignments for a specific authorisation policy.

path Parameters
authorisation_policy_id
required
string
Example: 0669bc0b-b5a7-4b67-b85f-0b684efa55d7

authorisation policy id

query Parameters
filter[<query/sort filter>]=
string
Example: filter[<query/sort filter>]==> filter[username_eq]=opschain

API filtering guide

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/authorisation_policies/{authorisation_policy_id}/assignments

Response samples

  • 200
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": [
    • {
      • "id": "e63c7c13-a706-4b67-a37c-e1f106405d61",
      • "type": "policy_assignment",
      • "attributes": {
        • "username": "limepoint",
        • "auth_provider": "ldap",
        • "groupname": "ldap-group",
        • "created_by": "mozell",
        • "created_at": "2025-10-17T04:04:59.843579Z",
        • "updated_at": "2025-10-17T04:04:59.843579Z"
        },
      • "links": {
        • "self": "/api/authorisation_policies/74f35ff8-0a07-49ec-9547-cbce0ad9f8b4/assignments/e63c7c13-a706-4b67-a37c-e1f106405d61"
        }
      }
    ],
  • "meta": {
    • "authorisations": {
      • "update": true
      }
    }
}

Assign a policy to users or groups

Assign an authorisation policy to one or more users and/or groups.

path Parameters
authorisation_policy_id
required
string
Example: 0669bc0b-b5a7-4b67-b85f-0b684efa55d7

authorisation policy id

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/authorisation_policies/{authorisation_policy_id}/assignments

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
Example
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "auth_provider": null,
      • "assignments": [
        • {
          • "username": "limepoint"
          }
        ]
      }
    }
}

  • 200
  • 400
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": [
    • {
      • "id": "0835368d-5907-4ff5-970b-a553d475c0b2",
      • "type": "policy_assignment",
      • "attributes": {
        • "username": null,
        • "auth_provider": null,
        • "groupname": null,
        • "created_by": "shelley_kuhlman",
        • "created_at": "2025-10-17T04:04:59.949275Z",
        • "updated_at": "2025-10-17T04:04:59.949275Z"
        },
      • "links": {
        • "self": "/api/authorisation_policies/0b55aa1a-2641-461e-9374-fc02e1e1ea7f/assignments/0835368d-5907-4ff5-970b-a553d475c0b2"
        }
      }
    ]
}

Authorisation policy rules

Endpoints to interact with authorisation policy rules.

List policy rules

Lists all policy rules for a specific authorisation policy.

path Parameters
authorisation_policy_id
required
string
Example: 0669bc0b-b5a7-4b67-b85f-0b684efa55d7

authorisation policy id

query Parameters
filter[<query/sort filter>]=
string
Example: filter[<query/sort filter>]==> filter[username_eq]=opschain

API filtering guide

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/authorisation_policies/{authorisation_policy_id}/rules

Response samples

  • 200
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": [
    • {
      • "id": "49fe0f47-97a9-49a9-a6e1-6d3ceb5e6fa3",
      • "type": "policy_rule",
      • "attributes": {
        • "id": "49fe0f47-97a9-49a9-a6e1-6d3ceb5e6fa3",

        • "created_at": "2025-10-17T04:05:01.156007Z",
        • "updated_at": "2025-10-17T04:05:01.156007Z"
        },
      • "links": {

      • "id": "c366c827-3d05-49bb-95d2-143bba18a61b",

Delete a policy rule

path Parameters
authorisation_policy_id
required
string
Example: 0669bc0b-b5a7-4b67-b85f-0b684efa55d7

policy_rule_id
required
string
Example: 1dc2d0f1-0941-40e2-a84b-c03a942f3685

policy rule id

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/authorisation_policies/{authorisation_policy_id}/rules/{policy_rule_id}

Response samples

  • 204
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{ }

Users

Responses

Response samples

  • 200
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": [
    • {
      • "id": "3ac2a9b8-10e5-4c29-b769-2040b88ba6e1",
      • "type": "user",
      • "attributes": {
        • "username": "roman",
        • "groupnames": [
          • "ldap-group-1",
          • "ldap-group-2"
          ],
        • "auth_provider": "ldap",
        • "created_at": "2025-10-17T04:05:29.227686Z",
        • "updated_at": "2025-10-17T04:05:29.227686Z"
        }
      }
    ]
}

Groups

Endpoints to interact with the user LDAP groups.

Secrets

Endpoints to interact with looking up secrets from the vault or decrypting AES encrypted strings. When sending an AES encrypted string in the query params, please ensure that the string is URL encoded (e.g. replacing + with %2B). This endpoint applies to any node path hierarchy. The below requests are valid:

  • /api/projects/demo/secrets?secret_path={secret_path}
  • /api/projects/demo/environments/dev/secrets?secret_path={secret_path})

Resolve secrets

Returns the decrypted values of the supplied secrets

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/secrets

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "owner_type": "settings",
      • "owner_id": "2d8ce49b-667b-4f54-8428-1bbc5b83f724",
      • "mintmodel_owner_path": "/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa",
      • "converge_date": "2025-10-17T04:04:09.166862Z",
      • "values_to_decrypt": [
        • "secret-vault://csh/infrastructure/files/oci_platform_configs.yaml",
        • "{AES2}TdxBDw3KtDj+FKKckKeF5A=={/IV}Ud/ubLWIwhpCwkgBa6DSd5A=="
        ]
      }
    }
}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 400
  • 422
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "secrets",
    • "type": "secrets",
    • "attributes": {
      • "results": [
        • {
          • "source": "secret-vault://csh/infrastructure/files/oci_platform_configs.yaml",
          • "result": "ERROR: You do not have permission to resolve settings secrets for /projects/opc/environments/dev",
          • "filename": null
          },
        • {
          • "source": "secret-vault://csh/infrastructure/sshkeys/oci_new_key",
          • "result": "ERROR: You do not have permission to resolve settings secrets for /projects/opc/environments/dev",
          • "filename": null
          }
        ]
      }
    }
}

        • "licence_issuer": "LimePoint Pty Ltd",
        • "licence_issuer_contact": "support@limepoint.com",
        • "licence_version": "1",
        • "customer_identifier": "Engineering",
        • "start_date": "2025-09-14T00:00:00Z",

      },

          • "global_encrypt": false

System configuration

Endpoint to fetch the current system configuration.

include
string
Example: include=settings

Responses

  • 200
Content type
application/vnd.api+json

Admin operations

Endpoints to monitor the status of your OpsChain instance.

Response samples

  • 200
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": [
    • {
      • "id": "0",
      • "type": "database_status",
      • "attributes": {
        • "version": "17.2",
        • "uptime": 898,
        • "database_size": "11 MB",
        • "events_table_size": "48 kB",
        • "log_lines_table_size": "40 kB",
        • "connections": {
          • "active": 1,
          • "idle": 1,
          • "max_configured": 100
          },
        • "pod": {
          • "name": "opschain-db-pod",
          • "namespace": "opschain",
          • "node": "node1",
          • "host_ip": "192.168.1.1",
          • "pod_ip": "192.168.1.2",
          • "start_time": "2021-01-01",
          • "state": "Running",
          • "image": "opschain-db-image",
          • "restart_count": 0,
          • "pvc_name": "opschain-db-claim"
          }
        },
      • "links": {
        • "self": "/api/admin/database"
        }
      }
    ]
}

  • "data": [
    • {
      • "id": "opschain.limepoint.engineering",

}

Get the status of the OpsChain queues

Response samples

  • 200
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": [
    • {
      • "id": "default",
      • "type": "queue_status",
      • "attributes": {
        • "name": "default",
        • "summary": {
          • "total": 10,
          • "running": 2,
          • "failed": 1,
          • "scheduled": 3,
          • "finished": 4,
          • "pending": 1
          },
        • "jobs": [
          • {
            • "job_class": "ChangeJob",
            • "total": 5,
            • "running": 1,
            • "failed": 1,
            • "scheduled": 2,
            • "finished": 3,
            • "pending": 0,
            • "next_run_at": "2025-10-17T16:04:15.574+11:00",
            • "last_run_at": "2025-10-17T14:04:15.574+11:00",
            • "highest_error_count": 2,
            • "description": "Verifies if a change can be started based on its owner configuration and, if so, starts it."
            },
          • {
            • "job_class": "DataCleanupJob",
            • "total": 5,
            • "running": 0,
            • "failed": 0,
            • "scheduled": 0,
            • "finished": 0,
            • "pending": 0,
            • "next_run_at": "2025-10-17T16:04:15.574+11:00",
            • "last_run_at": "2025-10-17T13:04:15.574+11:00",
            • "highest_error_count": 0,
            • "description": "Cleans up data based on a data cleanup definition."
            }
          ]
        }
      }
    ]
}

Get the status of the OpsChain API workers

Returns the status of all the OpsChain API workers in the configured namespace.

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/admin/workers

Response samples

  • 200
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": [
    • {
      • "id": "opschain-api-worker-1",
      • "type": "worker",
      • "attributes": {
        • "namespace": "opschain",
        • "node": "node-1",
        • "host_ip": "192.168.1.1",
        • "pod_ip": "192.168.1.2",
        • "start_time": "2021-01-01T00:00:00Z",
        • "state": "Running",
        • "image": "opschain-api-worker-image",
        • "restart_count": 0
        }
      }
    ]
}

Data cleanup definitions

Endpoints to interact with data cleanup definitions.

List data cleanup definitions

Lists all data cleanup definitions.

query Parameters
filter[<query/sort filter>]=
string
Example: filter[<query/sort filter>]==> filter[name_eq]=test

API filtering guide

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/data_cleanup_definitions

Response samples

  • 200
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": [
    • {
      • "id": "0dcc7e97-6473-4997-9535-40e2f78df988",
      • "type": "data_cleanup_definition",
      • "attributes": {
        • "name": "driver",
        • "enabled": true,
        • "created_by": "delfina",
        • "cron_schedule": "0 0 7,14,21,28 * *",
        • "repeat": true,
        • "maximum_run_count": null,
        • "purge_activities": false,
        • "purge_events": false,
        • "purge_jobs": false,
        • "filters": {
          • "changes": {
            • "created_at_lt": "2025-10-10T04:04:38.378Z"
            }
          },
        • "node_paths": [
          • "/projects/opc/environments/dev"
          ],
        • "run_count": 0,
        • "created_at": "2025-10-17T04:04:38.381431Z",
        • "updated_at": "2025-10-17T04:04:38.381431Z",
        • "next_run_at": "2025-10-20T13:00:00.000000Z",
        • "run_at": null,
        • "end_at": null
        },
      • "links": {
        • "self": "/api/data_cleanup_definitions/0dcc7e97-6473-4997-9535-40e2f78df988"
        }
      }
    ],
  • "meta": {
    • "authorisations": {
      • "update": true
      },
    • "has_any": true
    }
}

Create data cleanup definition

Notes:

  1. See the various payload examples to understand the required fields for each possible request to this endpoint.
  2. Either the cron_schedule or run_at fields must be provided.
  3. The keys accepted for the filters field are changes, events, jobs, and workflow_runs. Each of these can have ransack filters for the specific type they refer to. IMPORTANT: If no filters are provided for a data type, the cleanup will remove all data that matches the node paths.
  4. The node_paths field is an array of strings. Each string is a path to a node. The path must start with /projects and only contain forward slashes, lowercase letters, numbers and underscores, and optionally a single "%" at the end. Use the % wildcard to include all nodes under a specific node or node-type, note that this will apply the cleanup to all nodes that are yet to be created, as long as they match the path.
Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/data_cleanup_definitions

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
Example
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "name": "Will run once at 1am on 1st January 2020",
      • "enabled": true,
      • "node_paths": [ ],
      • "filters": { },
      • "purge_activities": false,
      • "purge_events": false,
      • "purge_jobs": true,
      • "cron_schedule": "55 17 13 8 0",
      • "run_at": "2020-01-01 01:00:00 UTC",
      • "end_at": null,
      • "maximum_run_count": null,
      • "repeat": false
      }
    }
}

Response samples

  • 201
  • 400
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "20131a71-2744-44d0-a652-2156eec4766e",
    • "type": "data_cleanup_definition",
    • "attributes": {
      • "name": "card",
      • "enabled": true,
      • "created_by": "edward",
      • "cron_schedule": "56 13 11 9 6",
      • "repeat": true,
      • "maximum_run_count": null,
      • "purge_activities": true,
      • "purge_events": true,
      • "purge_jobs": true,
      • "filters": { },
      • "node_paths": [ ],
      • "run_count": 0,
      • "created_at": "2025-10-17T04:04:38.706855Z",
      • "updated_at": "2025-10-17T04:04:38.706855Z",
      • "next_run_at": "2026-09-05T03:56:00.000000Z",
      • "run_at": null,
      • "end_at": null
      },
    • "links": {
      • "self": "/api/data_cleanup_definitions/20131a71-2744-44d0-a652-2156eec4766e"
      }
    },
  • "meta": {
    • "authorisations": {
      • "update": true
      }
    }
}

Show a data cleanup definition

Shows a data cleanup definition.

path Parameters
data_cleanup_definition_id
required
string
Example: ceb9d3ef-aaa6-456f-ad7f-654c9334d26e

data cleanup definition id

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/data_cleanup_definitions/{data_cleanup_definition_id}

  • 200
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "88b78030-75ca-4ab1-bbcc-ef9333574f6f",

    • "attributes": {
      • "name": "card",
      • "enabled": true,

        • "changes": {
          • "created_at_lt": "2025-10-10T04:04:39.188Z"

      • "update": true

Update the data cleanup definition

Updates a data cleanup definition.

Notes:

  1. See the various payload examples in the create endpoint to understand the attributes you can supply to this endpoint.
  2. The payload need only consist of the attributes you wish to modify. There is no need to supply the entire data cleanup definition.
path Parameters
data_cleanup_definition_id
required
string
Example: ceb9d3ef-aaa6-456f-ad7f-654c9334d26e

data cleanup definition id

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/data_cleanup_definitions/{data_cleanup_definition_id}

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
Example
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "name": "new_name",
      • "enabled": true,
      • "node_paths": [ ],
      • "filters": { },
      • "purge_activities": true,
      • "purge_events": false,
      • "purge_jobs": false,
      • "cron_schedule": "42 18 20 4 0",
      • "run_at": null,
      • "end_at": null,
      • "maximum_run_count": null,
      • "repeat": true
      }
    }
}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 400
  • 404

Delete the data cleanup definition

path Parameters
data_cleanup_definition_id
required
string
Example: ceb9d3ef-aaa6-456f-ad7f-654c9334d26e

data cleanup definition id

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/data_cleanup_definitions/{data_cleanup_definition_id}

Response samples

  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{ }
